Title: Requires individuals who perform compliance functions, duties or tasks to obtain a compliance officer or compliance practitioner license
Summary: Requires individuals who perform compliance functions, duties or tasks to obtain a compliance officer or compliance practitioner license; establishes application and examination requirements to obtain, and continuing education requirements to maintain, licensure; permits the superintendent to issue licensing procedures and to prescribe regulations necessary for the proper supervision of compliance officers and practitioners.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the financial services law, in relation to a compliance officer or compliance practitioner license
